title.narrative: Second Central Asia Regional Economic Cooperation Corridor 2 Road Investment Program - Tranche 2

description.narrative:
The components for financing under the Loan 2965-UZB are:
(i) Road development. The output will be about 75 km of the reconstructed section of A373/4R112 highway (between Km 0 and Km 75) from Pungan to Namangan. The investment will upgrade the existing two-lane section to a four-lane section with an international design. The cost includes civil works and construction supervision consulting services. This output was cancelled by the Government in 2017.
(ii) Additional financing for Tranche 1. The output will be completion of civil works for the 58 km road improvement approved under Tranche 1.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Increased travel efficiency on the reconstructed A373/4R112 highway sections

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
By 2022: Travel time from Tashkent to Osh border point reduced to 5 hours (2011 baseline: 7 hours)

description.narrative: Increased travel efficiency on the reconstructed A373/4R112 highway sections

title.narrative: By 2022: Annual roads maintenance budget is increased by no less than the annual inflation rate

description.narrative: Increased travel efficiency on the reconstructed A373/4R112 highway sections
